item.title: Installing Shoko Desktop
item.description: Windows Navigate to the Shoko Downloads page and download Shoko Desktop, unless told otherwise, we always recommend downloading the Stable version. The installer will guide you through the installation process and should only take a couple of minutes. Linux with Wine using Bottles Install Bottles (https://usebottles.com). This may require installing Flatpak and adding the Flathub repository if you don’t have it already. Before adding a bottle, go to Bottles preferences and under the “Runners” tab, install the latest Caffe or Proton GE.
